name: Salem (racreator)
description:
Welcome to Salem, Massachusetts. The year is 1693. You are a witch, and have been accused of possessing fellow Salem Village residents. You are now imprisoned in a fortified prison. Tomorrow, you will be hanged unless you escape.

Press the arrow keys to move yourself (the witch hat) around. Make sure to watch out for guards, represented by shields! To escape, get the key on each level. Once you get a key, the next level's lock will be unlocked and you can move forward.
